long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready for a new tab experience that brings you into the humorous and action-packed life of Ranma Saotome. From intense martial arts to hilarious transformations, this live wallpaper extension captures the heart of the classic anime, making it a perfect addition for fans of the series. With a playful design and practical features, this extension transforms every new tab into a nostalgic nod to Ranma 1/2.

Key Features
🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy animated scenes from the Ranma 1/2 universe on your new tab.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Access favorite websites easily with adjustable shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Quickly search the web without leaving your anime-inspired tab.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Keep track of time with a convenient clock and date view.
Whether you're reliving Ranma’s comical challenges or just want an engaging anime-themed new tab, this extension brings an iconic slice of Ranma 1/2 right to your screen. Ideal for longtime fans and newcomers alike, it's a fun way to stay connected to the spirit of classic anime!
